quotes.quote: My mother told me that fear is not an option. I always told that women are stronger, so I believed it.
I always believed that one woman’s success can only help another woman’s success.
A confident woman, a woman who truly knows her worth and her power is a force to be reckoned with.
Be the kind of woman that makes other woman want to be you.
The working lady was no longer a contradiction in terms but a new social phenomenon, emblematic of rapid developments.
She's a small-town, hard-working woman just trying to make a living working three jobs.
A hard working woman and a bone tired man now that old sun steals across a dusty floor.
She was a hard working woman true as one could be.
I need a hard working woman with respect who will this for everybody who ain't made it yet.
If your shoes refuse to shine and your legs don't walk in line and tomorrow is just some other time That's just the woman working on you.
They oughta' run your picture in a magazine 'Cause you're the hardest working woman I've ever seen.
Got a hard working woman, works hard all day long. Got a hard working woman, she works hard all the time. She's a hard working woman, I call her that gal of mine.
A dedication to the independent woman to the one working hard for hers.
Before feminism, work was largely defined as what men did or would do. Thus, a working woman was someone who labored outside the home for money, masculine-style.
A successful woman is one who can build a firm foundation w bricks others have thrown at her.
The perfect woman, you see is a working-woman; not an idler; not a fine lady; but one who uses her hands and her head and her heart for the good of others.
What's so great about working with really funny women is that vanity comes second. Whatever makes it real and funny, they're going to go for, and it's just great.

A working woman could save a few shillings a week, and then every five weeks she'd come in and we'd cut her hair. She could shampoo it under the shower, swing it and dry it off or just let it dry by itself. It changed the lives of many young girls who'd never had the opportunity to be styled like that before.
Behind every working woman is an enormous pile of unwashed laundry.
It's hard to be a woman. You must think like a man, act like a lady, look like a young girl, and work like a horse.
It's important for women to work. They need to keep their independence, to keep earning and being challenged.
The perfect woman, you see is a working woman; not an idler; not a fine lady; but one who uses her hands and her head and her heart for the good of others.
There is no force more powerful than a woman determined to rise.
A strong woman builds her own world. She is one who is wise enough to know that it will attract the man she will gladly share it with.
